#Webical actions

= Introduction =

Overview of the actions available in webical and their use.

The following actions are available:
  * AddEventAction
  * CalendarSelectedAction
  * DaySelectedAction
  * EditEventAction
  * EventSelectedAction
  * FormFishedAction
  * PeriodChangedAction
  * ShowCalendarAction
  * SwitchCalendarVisibilityAction
  * WeekSelectedAction
